title: Thousands attend funeral for Palestinian nurse killed in Gaza
content: A funeral for a nurse killed during recent protests in Gaza has attracted thousands of mourners.  Razan al-Najar was killed by Israeli fire whilst on duty as a volunteer nurse.  In a statement the Israeli military said it would investigate her death.
